sub_title: Brand and Communications Lead at PRé Sustainability
summary:
With 8+ years of experience in marketing and communications, I help impact-driven organizations build strong brands and drive engagement. Guided by purpose and fueled by creativity, my journey has been an exhilarating exploration of how strategic storytelling and impactful messaging can catalyze positive change. I also firmly believe that branding isn't just about feel-good stories; it's about measurable impact. So I’m all about data-driven strategy, a multidisciplinary approach, and empowering the team to innovate and grow.

Currently, I help build a thriving marcom team and memorable brands at PRé Sustainability. Our solutions offer science-based environmental insights that help companies drive sustainable change.

In my free time, you’ll find me exploring nature, reading, and getting inspired in art museums or at concerts.

Want to know more about our fact-based environmental solutions at PRé or chat about sustainable brands? Let's connect.

awards.title: 1st place in the UN-Habitat Youth photo competition #weareclimatechange
awards.description:
Awarded a trip to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change’s 23rd Conference of Parties (COP-23) in Bonn, Germany.
- speaker and youth representative at the Intergenerational Inquiry, COP23
- photographed, interviewed and provided Twitter coverage during the event (Facebook Live interview with Dr. Aisa Kirabo Kacyira, Deputy Executive Director of UN-Habitat)

https://unhabitat.org/women-leaders-at-the-centre-of-climate-action/

awards.description: Full scholarship to pursue a Master's degree.

profile_positions.description:
PRé is a leading voice in life cycle thinking, providing companies with reliable environmental insights to drive change. I joined the company as the only Communications Specialist and since then helped establish and grow a new Marketing Communications team as well as design and execute the strategy that’s closely tied to the company's goals.

-	Developed a comprehensive brand strategy and visual identity that increased recognition and engagement among target audiences.
-	Established a stronger product position in the market, differentiating it from competitors and appealing to target audiences.
-	Crafted clear, compelling, and consistent messaging that effectively communicated the company’s value proposition and vision.
-	Coordinated creation of high-quality content (e.g. case studies, articles) that established the company as a thought leader in its industry and provided valuable insights to customers, prospects, and stakeholders.
-	Established the company's presence at industry events, resulting in increased brand awareness and lead generation.
-	Recruited and trained a high-performing marketing communications team.
-	Developed team processes, procedures, and systems that improved efficiency and effectiveness.
-	Mentored and coached team members to help them achieve their personal and professional goals.
-	Secured buy-in and support from senior leadership for the marketing communications initiatives.
-	Aligned the marketing communications team with other departments, such as product development and sales, to ensure cohesive messaging and seamless execution.
-	Developed and executed a team development plan that ensured that the marketing communications team had the necessary skills, knowledge, and resources to succeed.
-	Advised on employer-branding plan to build an employer reputation and increase the number of high-quality candidates.
profile_positions.title: Brand and Communications Lead

profile_positions.description:
-	Designed and implemented a robust content and social media strategy that improved online visibility, engagement, and reputation management.
-	Successfully refreshed the branding of the company and its key product, resulting in a new visual identity and messaging that accurately reflected values and vision.
-	Lead and delivered the website redesign project that resulted into more on-brand content,  improved UX and engagement and more flexibility and scalability.
-	Executed successful launch campaign that introduced the new brands to key audiences and generated positive coverage by partners.
-	Coordinated the development of new brand guidelines that ensured consistent and effective implementation of the brand across all channels and touchpoints.
-	Managed the email marketing program, resulting in increased open and click-through rates.
-	Improved brand recognition and reputation among target audiences globally through consistent and effective brand messaging and distribution via partners.
-	Increased customer engagement and loyalty through improved customer experiences and interactions with the brand.
-	Built relationships with new and existing partners and stakeholders that expanded the reach and impact of the brand.
-	Designed and managed marketing materials that helped strengthen brand messaging.
-	Continuously monitored marketing performance and insights for informed business decisions.

profile_positions.company: IHS Institute for Housing and Urban Development Studies
profile_positions.description:
Contributed to development of two online courses (MOOCs) for Coursera with more than 12k learners: 'Financing Infrastructure in African Cities' and 'Social Science Methods for Urban Research'.
- contributed to the learning experience design
- designed look and feel of the video lectures and added visual elements to make complex topics easier to digest 
- general coordination with the lecturers and the studio
- created content for the course pages on Coursera, for communication emails and a user survey
- wrote and reviewed scripts for the video lectures

Contributed to developing a Training of Trainers on 'Metropolitan governance' for an international pool of consultants, based on the methodology by GIZ and UN-Habitat. 

Also, I gave workshops, lectures and field visits for the Master's students on the topics of sustainable mobility and design.
profile_positions.title: Project Officer

profile_positions.description:
I joined the team when the brand just entered a new market in Belarus. My role was to develop and implement an integrated marketing strategy and to raise brand awareness:
- created marketing campaigns and programs 
- coordinated partnership marketing activities
- ensured production and distribution of promotional materials 
- coordinated interior and exterior design of the new branches in line with corporate identity
- coordinated website development and managed its content
- customer relationship marketing
- quality management

volunteer_experiences.description:
- PR and social media management (Facebook, Instagram)
- updated visual identity 
- designed promotional materials
- conducted local youth training and organized cultural exchanges 
- co-organized a cultural exchange event "Discover Belarus". The goal was to provide an opportunity for AEGEE members to explore and experience Belarusian culture and traditions, to help debunk stereotypes and to foster mutual understanding. It was a 6 days program for 16 participants from 9 countries.

2014 - Education Working Group board member
2015-2016 - Advisory member
Wrote articles, conducted interviews and took photos during the events at the Belarusian Model United Nations project.
